column3:
Basically like carrying a gas
burner.
You're better off just
punching.

Can be upgraded up to +10,
letting you
hurl a massive fireball at the
target.

Getting hit by a rock hurts
far more
than getting hit by ice.
Useless.

Can be upgraded up to +10,
letting you
slam a massive block of ice
into the target.

A technique against ghosts.
Only this can damage them.
